entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAot] Objective-C Marshal: find method handle when propagating exceptions #80985
  • Reduce overhead of the threadpool task dispatching. #80984
  • Reduce tendency of the threadpool to consume extra CPU resources when it is not helpful. #80983
  • Make big endian, little endian chosable in BitConverter #80982
  • Allow specialization for typeof(T) pattern in Mono AOT compiler #80980
    Future
  • Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #80977
    8.0.0
  • error CS0006: Metadata file '.../maccatalyst-arm64/StartupHookForFunctionalTest.dll' could not be found #80976
  • Different class layout for LayoutKind.Explicit in .NET 7 #80973
  • [JIT] Bool optimization case #80966
    Future
  • Single-file host tracing should include version and/or commit hash #80961

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: implicit cast ValueTask<T> to ValueTask #67212
    Future
  • Allow an await to capture the current TaskScheduler instead of the current SynchronizationContext #47433
    Future
  • Task-Like custom implementation breaks AsyncLocal data #56594
    Future
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions: Missing net standard 2.1 type forwarders in Nuget Package #59021
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make the Task.CancellationToken property public #62006
    Future
  • Please Introduce Specifier for Task to run it in P or L Core. #65659
    Future
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object exception in NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() #40463
    Future
  • Dataflow TransformBlock cannot accept messages while Link predicates goes well. #37125
    Future
  • Feature Request : Eliminate unpredictable stacktraces when the same Exception object is being concurrently re-thrown #32009
    Future
  • jitstress failure from recent pred list changes #80974
    8.0.0
  • Question: does CLR support for coroutines make sense? #1651
    Future
  • API Request: Method to temporarily disable Task synchronization #1448
    Future
  • Tasks.Dataflow - Aggregation Block and Rendezvous Block #31531
    Future
  • Proposal: Asynchronously cancel a CancellationTokenSource #23405
    Future
  • Tasks.Dataflow SourceObservable onError behaviour differs from standard Rx operators #31236
    Future
  • [mono][interp] Offset allocation of call args is incorrect #80175
    8.0.0
  • JIT further Boolean logic optimization #55605
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Dataflow SourceBlock<T> #80915

PullRequests

Created

  • Change how a task stress test is disabled #80981
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [wasm] testing fix #80979
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • NativeAOT: Optimize static fields of gc types #80969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add gsharedvt wrapper punchthrough to jiterpreter #80968
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #80967
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Merged

  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][loader] Set status on success #80949
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT: fix jit stress failures in `fgSetBlockOrder` #80975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Extend Mono.ValueTuple to 7 arguments. #80972
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add suppression for CS8500 to test reflection/regression/github_25697 #80964
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle Span<T>.Length and ReadOnlySpan<T>.Length as intrinsic #80932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Change the default trimmode here too #80940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Guard leading/trailing zero count #80913
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set `TrimMode=full` for tests #80944
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add expected output tests for regex source generator #80937
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: reset max bbnum after failed inline attempt #80958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow forced building of mobile manifest pkgs, outside mobile builds #80920
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug info refactoring #2178

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge PR 67238 - JIT: Refactor call argument representation #2177

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable dotnet SDK to support targeting iOS with NativeAOT #30068
    8.0.1xx
  • Can't create/build Blazor (Wasm) without problems of missing Workloads? #30067

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix links in .gitignore #30066
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 286: Build ID 2093567 #30064
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • update output path in WebProjectsTests #30048
    Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30061
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TypeSymbol of unbound generic does not return any member or type information #66512
  • C# and VB operation trees are different for logically the same code #66511
  • [API Proposal]: Preprocessing symbol APIs #66510
  • Keyword color for u8 identifier is broken in VS 17.5 Preview 3 #66507

Closed

  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • CreateCompilation default option to detect 'unsafe' keyword #66509
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix handling of Regex classification when splitting to multiple lines #66508
    Area-IDE
  • Block instrumentation improvements #66506
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Clean up some checks in FileChangeWatcher.Context.EnqueueWatchingFile #66488
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add chrome.identity support for WebAssembly auth #46203
  • Random crash on Linux because assembly Microsoft.Win32.Registry cannot be loaded on aspnet 6.0.13 #46201
  • WebSocket .NET 7 receiving empty message #46200
    Discussions

Closed

  • NTLM support for SignalR Java client #46188
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak #45098
    Discussions
  • [Test Collection Cleanup Failure (Controller Test Collection)]: System.InvalidOperationException : The logger is already frozen #46199
  • Allow minimal host to be created without default HostBuilder behavior #32485
    8.0-preview1
  • [Test Collection Cleanup Failure (Controller Test Collection)]: System.InvalidOperationException : The logger is already frozen. #46162
  • w3wp.exe APPCRASH - The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception: System.InvalidOperationException: The current thread is not associated with the Dispatcher. #46165
  • [API Proposal] Allow Dispatching to Blazor Renderer Sync Context #46068
    8.0-preview1
  • API for dispatching to renderer sync context and capturing exceptions #44920
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete duplicate define #46202
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions when getting an error in server to client streaming #46198
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net

Merged

  • Allow minimal host to be created without default HostBuilder behavior #46040
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf, 8.0-preview1
  • Add DispatchExceptionAsync to ComponentBase #46074
    area-blazor, feature-rendering, 8.0-preview1
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Workaround fabricbot `addMielstone` task issue #46195
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    2.1.x
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, pr: pending author input
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46182
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • To get host address in Configure method of Startup class #46110
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Move Kestrel shared source to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #46132
    area-blazor
  • [Named pipes] Disconnect + delayed client read test cases #46166
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added withServerTimeout and withKeepAliveInterval to HubConnectionBuilder for java client #46172
    area-signalr
  • Prevent merging PRs which have CI checks run a week+ ago #46177
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement RouteHandlerServices.Map and use in RequestDelegateGenerator #46180
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ISafeAreaView.IgnoreSafeArea isn't respected in .NET 7 #12823
  • Windows Share.RequestAsync is brain dead - please make it like Mac, Android and iOS #12822
  • WebView not render on older android version #12821

Closed

  • Drag and Drop app crashes with .NET 7 #10715
    Backlog
  • MAUI rollbacks no longer publicly available causing build to fail #12814
  • Where is MVU? Tired of using old and unnecessarily verbose XAML #12819

PullRequests

Created

  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12804
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers from 3.3.3 to 3.3.4 #12742
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1462.37 to 1.0.1518.46 #12712
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update sdk-insertion-bump.yml #12810
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
